name: bee-porter
description: This is an app that helps beekeepers find wild swarms. Users can open the app and record their location to the database via a selection button. Beekeepers can then login and have access to where the swarms are.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Zach Elbring, Jared Fleshren, Gary Harris, Alex Messina, Katy Thompson, Jared Woodcock
